revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Radxa |model=Rock Pi 4 |revision=A (1GB) |upc=4038816107060 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=39 |est_release_date=11/2018 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=9-20 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Type-C |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3399 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=6 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=XTX Tech |fla1_model=XT25F32BWOIG |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H9HCNNN4KUML-HRNME |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, NGFF (M.2), USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, via GPIO header,, (1500000 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK808-D;;1;,,, Low Power Audio CODEC;Everest Semiconductor;ES8316;;1;,,, USB Type-C PD2.0 Controller;Shenzhen Legendary Tech;LDR6015T;;1;,,, Fixed 5V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, 16V 3A 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1495S;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR837;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR838;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089;;1;,,, 1A 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8088;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bi-directional Level Shifter;Diodes Inc;PI4ULS5V104;;1;,,, 100mÎ© Power Distribution Switch;SG Micro;SGM2576;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;LP Semi;LP3983S;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;6; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module socket, HDMI 2.0, Audio out (3.5mm), SPDIF, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, RTC, ADC, SPI, I2C, I2S, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.09; |stock_os=Linux;4.4.154;Ubuntu 20.04; |tp_firmware=Android (9TV/10), Armbian, LibreELEC, Manjaro ARM, DietPi |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=rock |default_pass=rock }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://wiki.radxa.com/Rockpi4 Product page]
{{See also|Radxa|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) @1.8GHz :+ Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.4GHz *GPU: ''Mali-T864'' (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG 1.1, OpenCL, DX11) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 1GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Storage: 4MB (SPI) Flash, eMMC module socket :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 3.0 (OTG), 2x USB 2.0 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C (supporting USB PD 2.0) :and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0
===Links=== *[http://linuxgizmos.com/rk3399-based-raspberry-pi-clone-will-launch-at-49-or-even-lower/ ''RK3399 Raspberry Pi clone will launch at $39'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/11/08/rock-pi-4-raspberry-pi-rk3399-board/ ''Rock Pi 4 Raspberry Pi Compatible RK3399 Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
__NOTOC__
